Dependent destroy of comments

Update file app/models/post.rb

Change 

   has_many :comments

To 

   has_many :comments, dependent: :destroy

Becomes 

 class Post < ActiveRecord::Base
   has_many :comments, dependent: :destroy
   validates :title, presence: true,
                     length: { minimum: 5 }
 end
